items.title: Scott McLaughlin claims third straight Supercars Championship
items.description: Scott McLaughlin joins illustrious company in completing a championship three-peat, wrapping up the title in the penultimate round in South Australia.
items.content: Scott McLaughlin joins illustrious company in completing a championship three-peat, wrapping up the title in the penultimate round in South Australia.

items.title: Vixens down Lightning to reach Super Netball finals on winning note
items.description: In a clash between the top two sides this season, Melbourne Vixens show why they are title favourites with a 58-54 defeat of Sunshine Coast Lightning.
items.content: In a clash between the top two sides this season, Melbourne Vixens show why they are title favourites with a 58-54 defeat of Sunshine Coast Lightning.

items.title: Here are the key points from the modelling behind Victoria's next steps out of lockdown
items.author: Yara Murray-Atfield
items.description: According to COVID-19 modelling released by the Victorian Government today, primary school students are at a "lower risk" than initially thought, there's still a risk of a third wave of infection and the effective reproduction rate is dropping.
items.content: According to COVID-19 modelling released by the Victorian Government today, primary school students are at a "lower risk" than initially thought, there's still a risk of a third wave of infection and the effective reproduction rate is dropping.

items.title: Melbourne Storm fall to Dragons ahead of NRL finals
items.description: The Dragons hand the understrength Storm a 30-22 loss on the eve of the finals, while the selfless Warriors prepare to head home to New Zealand after finishing off their season with a win over Manly.
items.content: The Dragons hand the understrength Storm a 30-22 loss on the eve of the finals, while the selfless Warriors prepare to head home to New Zealand after finishing off their season with a win over Manly.

items.title: Easing of meat processing restrictions in Victoria just in time to meet Christmas demands, says industry
items.author: Jane McNaughton
items.description: Meatworks in both metropolitan Melbourne and regional Victoria will be able to increase workforce numbers under the next step of the state's roadmap to recovery.
items.content: Meatworks in both metropolitan Melbourne and regional Victoria will be able to increase workforce numbers under the next step of the state's roadmap to recovery.

items.title: LNP promises $33b spend on 15-year plan to improve Bruce Highway north of Sunshine Coast
items.author: Jessica Rendall
items.description: Opposition Leader Deb Frecklington says it will take 15 years to complete, but the plan will create 100,000 jobs and will begin with a "detailed planning study".
items.content: Opposition Leader Deb Frecklington says it will take 15 years to complete, but the plan will create 100,000 jobs and will begin with a "detailed planning study".

items.title: Melbourne's restrictions roadmap has changed a bit. Here's what's allowed from tomorrow
items.author: Leonie Thorne
items.description: From tomorrow the city's curfew will be scrapped, and there'll also no longer be a limit on how many people from a single household can go grocery shopping. Here's more details on what's changing in Melbourne.
items.content: From tomorrow the city's curfew will be scrapped, and there'll also no longer be a limit on how many people from a single household can go grocery shopping. Here's more details on what's changing in Melbourne.

items.title: Man and woman arrested and charged after stolen car crashes in Adelaide
items.description: SA Police arrest and charge a man and a woman who allegedly crashed a stolen car early this morning. In a separate incident, a man is charged over erratic driving in Adelaide's foothills.
items.content: SA Police arrest and charge a man and a woman who allegedly crashed a stolen car early this morning. In a separate incident, a man is charged over erratic driving in Adelaide's foothills.

items.title: Australia clinches T20 series win against New Zealand
items.description: Australia takes an unassailable 2-0 lead in its T20 series against New Zealand, following an eight-wicket triumph at Allan Border Field in Brisbane.
items.content: Australia takes an unassailable 2-0 lead in its T20 series against New Zealand, following an eight-wicket triumph at Allan Border Field in Brisbane.

items.title: Melbourne's curfew scrapped, third step brought forward as coronavirus restrictions eased
items.author: Yara Murray-Atfield And Dan Harrison
items.description: Melbourne's curfew will be lifted, all primary school students will return to the classroom in early October and up to five people can gather outside from tomorrow, Premier Daniel Andrews announces.
items.content: Melbourne's curfew will be lifted, all primary school students will return to the classroom in early October and up to five people can gather outside from tomorrow, Premier Daniel Andrews announces.
